title: Just a quick Taliyah portrait
body: Thank you Riot for creating her. She's beautiful and very unique looking.

replies.body: This is amazingly well done, especially in so short a time frame after Taliyah's reveal! Have my upvote and keep your spirits high! {{champion:201}}

Thank you so much! :D 
My spirits shall always be high when I art {{champion:202}} (because of such nice comments <3 )

You say that now but wait till she dominates the rift :P
Then everyone will hate her :D
Yeah she's probably be full of too much cc and damage but - she still looks hella cool! :D
This is great :D  I love the textured backdrop and especially the orange backlight thing going on behind her.  Makes her really pop.
Woah, thank you so much for the compliment! :D
